followup.description: Adds POWER roll to the action.

powerup.description: Adds POWER stat to the action.

opportunity.description: Adds FOCUS roll to the action.

side_step.description: Multiplies your action by your Speed Multiplier.

quick_step.description: Rolls your Proficiency times your SPEED Multiplier (PROMULT) and adds it to the action.

heal_self.description: Recover a POWER roll's worth of HEALTH.

heal_ally.description: A random ally (or yourself) recovers a POWER roll's worth of HEALTH.

heal_team.description: Your entire team recovers a POWER roll's worth of HEALTH.

focus_self.description: Charge a POWER roll's worth of FOCUS.

focus_ally.description: A random ally (or yourself) charges a POWER roll's worth of FOCUS.

focus_team.description: Your entire team charges a POWER roll's worth of HEALTH.

soothe_self.description: Recover a (max) FOCUS roll's worth of HEALTH.

soothe_ally.description: A random ally (or yourself) recovers a (max) FOCUS roll's worth of HEALTH.

soothe_team.description: Your entire team recovers a (max) FOCUS roll's worth of HEALTH.

inspire_self.description: Charge a (max) FOCUS roll's worth of FOCUS.

inspire_ally.description: A random ally (or yourself) charges a (max) FOCUS roll's worth of FOCUS.

inspire_team.description: Your entire team charges a (max) FOCUS roll's worth of HEALTH.

boost_self.description: Recover a PROMULT roll's worth of HEALTH.

boost_ally.description: A random ally (or yourself) recovers a PROMULT roll's worth of HEALTH.

boost_team.description: Your entire team recovers a PROMULT roll's worth of HEALTH.

motivate_self.description: Charge a PROMULT roll's worth of FOCUS.

motivate_ally.description: A random ally (or yourself) charges a PROMULT roll's worth of FOCUS.

motivate_team.description: Your entire team charges a PROMULT roll's worth of HEALTH.

snipe.description: Hit a random opponent for damage equal to your POWER die.

crossfire.description: Hit a random opponent for a POWER roll's worth of damage.

berserk.description: You and a random opponent take damage equal to half your current HEALTH.

backup.description: A random ally rolls POWER and adds it to the action.

gang_up.description: All allies add their POWER to the action.

intimidate.description: Rolls POWER and subtracts the result from your opponent's action.

anticipate.description: Rolls FOCUS and subtracts the result from your opponent's action.

dodge.description: Rolls PROMULT and subtracts the result from your opponent's action.

mastery.description: A completely BUSTED move that adds the sum of all your stats to the roll.

housecleaning.description: Someone comes to clean up the house for the team every month, boosting REST by 5.

chef.description: Everyone on the team recovers +3 health when Resting.
